post:
![](https://hostcule.com/assets/images/logo.png)

HostCule offers web hosting services for startups, developers, or even for large-scale businesses. Our hosting servers are located in **Las Vegas (US)** and **Nottingham (UK)** and we're looking into expanding into more locations very soon.

All plans are 50% off when paid annually. Use coupon code **SAVE10** to get a 10% recurring discount on any plan and payment term.

**Offers**

**Small**

* 3 GB SSD-powered Storage
* 100 GB Monthly Bandwidth
* Unlimited MySQL Databases
* Unlimited E-mails
* Unlimited Hosted Domains
* Free SSL Certificates via Let's Encrypt
* Monthly: $2
* Yearly: $12

Order (US): https://my.hostcule.com/index.php/order/main/packages/us-shared/?group_id=2

Order (UK): https://my.hostcule.com/index.php/order/main/packages/uk-shared/?group_id=3

**Medium**

* 5 GB SSD-powered Storage
* 200 GB Monthly Bandwidth
* Unlimited MySQL Databases
* Unlimited E-mails
* Unlimited Hosted Domains
* Free SSL Certificates via Let's Encrypt
* Monthly: $3
* Yearly: $18

Order (US): https://my.hostcule.com/index.php/order/main/packages/us-shared/?group_id=2

Order (UK): https://my.hostcule.com/index.php/order/main/packages/uk-shared/?group_id=3

**Large**

* 10 GB SSD-powered Storage
* 500 GB Monthly Bandwidth
* Unlimited MySQL Databases
* Unlimited E-mails
* Unlimited Hosted Domains
* Free SSL Certificates via Let's Encrypt
* Monthly: $4
* Yearly: $24

Order (US): https://my.hostcule.com/index.php/order/main/packages/us-shared/?group_id=2

Order (UK): https://my.hostcule.com/index.php/order/main/packages/uk-shared/?group_id=3

Our terms of service can be found [here](https://hostcule.com/terms).
